issue.title: [Go] ipc.Reader should panic for invalid string array offsets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16831](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16831). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ipc.Reader will silently accept string columns with invalid offsets. This results in a panic later when attempting to access the table or write it with ipc.Writer.
